    Spatiotemporal cross validation types Downloading EPA Daily Data

Function reference

download data

Download environmental data and process functions

download_aqs_data()
download_aqs_data: download daily data from AQS datamart
download_data()
download_data: a wrapper function for download covariate sources
download_ecoregion_data()
download_ecoregion_data: download Ecoregion Shapefiles from EPA.
download_geos_cf_data()
download_geos_cf_data: download atmospheric composition data from the NASA Global Earth Observing System (GEOS) model.
download_gmted_data()
download_gmted_data: download global elevation data from the Global Multi- resolution Terrain Elevation Data (GMTED2010).
download_koppen_geiger_data()
download_koppen_geiger_data: download climate classification data from the Present and future Köppen-Geiger climate classification maps.
download_merra2_data()
download_merra2_data: download meteorological and atmospheric data from the Modern-Era Retrospective analysis for Research and Applications, Version 2 (MERRA-2) model.
download_modis_data()
download_modis_data:
download_narr_monolevel_data()
download_narr_monolevel_data: download monolevel meteorological data from NOAA NCEP North American Regional Reanalysis (NARR) model.
download_narr_p_levels_data()
download_narr_p_levels_data: download pressure level meteorological data from NOAA NCEP North American Regional Reanalysis (NARR) model.
download_nlcd_data()
download_nlcd_data: download land cover data from the National Land Cover Database Science Research Products.
download_noaa_hms_smoke_data()
download_noaa_hms_smoke_data: download daily wildfire smoke plume data from NOAA Hazard Mapping System Fire and Smoke Product
download_permit()
Check for data download acknowledgement
download_remove_command()
Remove or keep wget command file
download_remove_zips()
Remove downloaded zip files
download_run()
download_run: execute or skip `system_command` in data download function.
download_sanitize_path()
Sanitize path to end with a forward slash
download_sedac_groads_data()
download_sedac_groads_data: download Global Roads Open Access Data Set (gROADS), v1 (1980-2010) data from NASA Socioeconomic Data and Applications Center (SEDAC).
download_sedac_population_data()
download_sedac_population_data: download UN WPP-Adjusted population density data from NASA Socioeconomic Data and Applications Center (SEDAC).
download_setup_dir()
Check if input directory exists
download_sink()
Start sink download commands into a text file
download_unzip()
Unzip downloaded data
build_pipeline()
Title Build_Pipeline

check functions

Download environmental data and process functions

check_crs_is_valid()
Check if the output is with the valid coordinate reference system
check_data_completeness()
Check if the output covariates are complete
check_for_null_parameters()
Check for null arguments
check_input_raster_in_extent()
Check if the input raster is in the expected extent
check_means_are_valid()
Check if the output prediction mean values are in the valid range
check_output_locs_are_valid()
Check output locations are in the reference spatial domain of the mainland US
check_temporal_range()
Check if input data is within user defined temporal range
check_url_file_exist()
Check if sample of download URLs have HTTP Status 200
check_urls()
Sample download URLs and apply `check_url_file_exist` function
check_variances_are_valid()
Check if the output prediction variances are non-negative

spacetime data and cross-validation

future stdt package materials

convert_stdt()
Convert a stdt to sf/sftime/SpatVector
convert_stdt_sftime()
Convert a stdtobj to sftime
convert_stdt_spatrastdataset()
Convert a stdtobj to SpatRasterDataset
convert_stdt_spatvect()
Convert a stdt to SpatVector
convert_stobj_to_stdt()
Convert spatio-temporal object to a datatable with lon, lat, time, predictors columns. It also returns the crs.
is_stdt()
Boolean to know if an object correspond to a stdtobj
dt_to_sf()
Create a sf object from a data.table
dt_to_sftime()
Create a sftime object from a data.table
project_dt()
Project coordinates in a datatable from crs_ori to crs_dest
generate_block_sp_index()
Generate blocked spatial index
generate_cv_index()
Generate spatio-temporal cross-validation index
generate_cv_index_lblo()
Generate spatio-temporal cross-validation index (leave-block-location-out)
generate_cv_index_lblto()
Generate spatio-temporal cross-validation index (leave-block-location-time-out)
generate_cv_index_lbto()
Generate spatio-temporal cross-validation index (leave-block-time-out)
generate_cv_index_lolo()
Generate spatio-temporal cross-validation index (leave-one-location-out)
generate_cv_index_lolto()
Generate spatio-temporal cross-validation index (leave-one-location-time-out)
generate_cv_index_loto()
Generate spatio-temporal cross-validation index (leave-one-time-out)
generate_cv_index_random()
Generate spatio-temporal cross-validation index (random)
generate_spt_index()
Generate unique spatiotemporal identifier from stdt object
extract_urls()
Extract URLs from download commands

geographic covariate

functions to calculate geographic covariates

calc_koppen_geiger()
Calculate Koeppen-Geiger climate zone binary variables
calc_nlcd_ratio()
Compute land cover classes ratio in circle buffers around points

base learning

fitting base learner models

fit_base_learner()
Fit base learner
fit_base_learner_cnn()
Fit convolutional neural networks with neural network library
fit_base_learner_ranger()
Fit random forests with ranger
fit_base_learner_xgboost()
Fit XGBoost model
generic_base_learner()
define a base learner dummy: this illustrates one way to wrap a learning algorithm and return an object that makes predictions

meta learning

fitting the meta learner model

generic_meta_learner()
Title Generic_Meta_Learner
meta_learner_fit()
meta_learner_fit Fit a BART (Bayesian Additive Regression Tree) meta learner. It takes predictions of other models such as kriging, GLM, machine learning models as input and fits a BART Model
meta_learner_predict()
meta_learner_predict - take the list of BART fit objects and predictions of baselearners to create meta_learner predictions. The BART meta learner is not explicitly a S-T model, but the input covariates (outputs of each base learner) are S-T based.

other functions

other helper functions

read_commands()
Read commands and convert to character vector
startup_nrtap()
Start-up settings
test_download_functions()
Apply download function-specific unit tests
